name: Catching Fairies
description:
Hari's doctor has a dangerous obsession with mythical creatures  and she needs to keep an eye on him for the sake of her entire village. 

---------

(3.31.21)

This game is currently a work in progress! It's also the first game of any sort I've ever uploaded so I'm super nervous, but I hope it works for everyone and I would love any suggestions or feedback to make it better. I hope to add more characters for sure! Thank you so much for your time!

Currently the assets don't display right on mobile browsers, but hopefully I can figure out how to fix that soon!

(The demo  was uploaded for NaNoRenO 2021. ) 

----------
